docs.lead_paragraph: A report said the apartments are plagued by a range of conditions that include lead paint, collapsing ceilings and inadequate heat and hot water.

headline.main: Homeless Given Apartments in Buildings Called Unsafe
headline.print_headline: Homeless Given Apartments In Buildings Called Unsafe

docs.snippet: A report said the apartments are plagued by a range of conditions that include lead paint, collapsing ceilings and inadequate heat and hot water.
